author: protolambda
content: <@543900561460822016> can you help review above PR from <@680245613258211336> ? I think it helps a lot. And e.g. Infura/geth/nethermind support it for `eth_getProof` at least AFAIK, but Alchemy is watching the specs closely and waiting for them to match the implementation before supporting it.
